definition: A physical sensation characterized by the temporary appearance of small bumps on the skin, typically caused by strong emotions, such as fear, excitement, or awe. It is often experienced while watching a thrilling movie, listening to a moving piece of music, or during moments of intense anticipation.

examples.german: Ich bekam Gänsehaut, als ich den Horrorfilm sah.
examples.english: I got goosebumps when I watched the horror movie.

examples.german: Die Musik war so schön, dass ich Gänsehaut bekam.
examples.english: The music was so beautiful that I got goosebumps.

examples.german: Als er mir ins Ohr flüsterte, bekam ich Gänsehaut.
examples.english: When he whispered in my ear, I got goosebumps.

examples.german: Die gruselige Geschichte gab mir Gänsehaut.
examples.english: The creepy story gave me goosebumps.

examples.german: Der Anblick des verlassenen Hauses verursachte Gänsehaut.
examples.english: The sight of the abandoned house caused goosebumps.
